storyBlock.ideaBody: Your story is the blueprint. Your commitment is the inspiration. You're the reason they'll start their journey tomorrow.
storyBlock.spiritTitle: For those who felt the pain
storyBlock.spiritBody: You earned this. That pain was real. It will forever be a part of you. It is an extension of you; it was forged in persistence, patience, and sweat.
storyBlock.focusBody: You know the wall, and you know how to break it. This is for the warrior who never quitsâ€”on the pavement, at the gym, through the art.
